text:
Yeah it just feels weird using something like megascans and compiling different layers together to make a new material, normally I do things from scratch but the results with this method are so much better. Maybe it's because I'm taught to always do things from scratch 

Yeah I'm thinking if I find some really good concept art I should use that and then in my prepro I can show the different types of materials I'll see, unique objects, modular assets ect and itll help me plan my time better
